
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52448765">
<font size="5">随着人工智能技术的迅猛发展，AI已经不仅仅是一个技术概念，</font><br>
<font size="5">而是成为推动经济和社会转型的重要力量。</font><br>
<font size="5">在这本电子书<font color="#ff0000">《激活：AI大潮下的新质生产力》</font>中，</font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><br>
<font size="5">深入探讨AI如何重塑各个行业的生产力，并为企业和个人创造新的价值。</font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_KNIPP" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1080" height="625" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/QQ图片20250222142810_a5b087cf9ed1d.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" style="cursor:pointer" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/QQ图片20250222142810_a5b087cf9ed1d.png"><br>
